definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Uijeongbu District Court will be held on November 1 to pronounce on the case.
sentences.chinese: 議政府地方法院將於11月1日就這一案件作出宣判。

sentences.english: The higher people's court may review decisions of the local court.
sentences.chinese: 高級人民法院可以複查地方法院的判決。

sentences.english: Sliker is expected to face a preliminary hearing in Jefferson County Court early next week.
sentences.chinese: 斯里克將與下週接受傑弗森地方法院初審。

sentences.english: South Korea's local court late Wednesday issued a warrant to arrest former Prime Minister Han Myeong-sook.
sentences.chinese: 韓國地方法院16日晚間批捕前總理韓明淑。

sentences.english: The local court received her petition for divorce.
sentences.chinese: 地方法院受理了她的離婚申請。

sentences.english: District Court of Bad Liebenwerda, Brandenburg, Germany, 2002
sentences.chinese: 巴特利本韋達地方法院，布蘭登貝格，德國。

sentences.english: They appeared in a magistrate's court in the northeastern town of Middleburg.
sentences.chinese: 他們出現在東北部城鎮米德爾堡的地方法院。

sentences.english: The High Administrative Court may entrust the local courts to conduct the preservation of evidences.
sentences.chinese: 高等行政法院實施保全證據，得囑託地方法院爲之。

sentences.english: It must be remembered, that at that epoch the Gazette des Tribunaux was not yet in existence.
sentences.chinese: 我們記得，當時還沒有地方法院公報。

sentences.english: It was an election that benched him in the district court.
sentences.chinese: 那是一次使他當上地方法院法官的選舉。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute

definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
